AgentAliasArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the alias of the agent.

AgentAliasHistoryEvents.description: Contains details about the history of the alias.

AgentAliasId.description: The unique identifier of the alias of the agent.

AgentAliasStatus.description:
The status of the alias of the agent and whether it is ready for use. The following statuses are possible:

- CREATING – The agent alias is being created.
- PREPARED – The agent alias is finished being created or updated and is ready to be invoked.
- FAILED – The agent alias API operation failed.
- UPDATING – The agent alias is being updated.
- DELETING – The agent alias is being deleted.
- DISSOCIATED - The agent alias has no version associated with it.

CreatedAt.description: The time at which the alias of the agent was created.

UpdatedAt.description: The time at which the alias was last updated.

EndDate.description: The date that the alias stopped being associated to the version in the `routingConfiguration` object

RoutingConfiguration.description: Contains details about the version of the agent with which the alias is associated.

StartDate.description: The date that the alias began being associated to the version in the `routingConfiguration` object.

AgentAliasHistoryEvent.description: Contains details about the history of the alias.

AgentVersion.description: The version of the agent with which the alias is associated.

AgentAliasRoutingConfigurationListItem.description: Contains details about the routing configuration of the alias.

description:
Specifies an agent alias as a resource in a top-level template. Minimally, you must specify the following properties:

- AgentAliasName – Specify a name for the alias.

For more information about creating aliases for an agent in Amazon Bedrock , see [Deploy an Amazon Bedrock agent](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/bedrock/latest/userguide/agents-deploy.html) .

See the *Properties* section below for descriptions of both the required and optional properties.

AgentAliasName.description: The name of the alias of the agent.

AgentId.description: The unique identifier of the agent.

Description.description: The description of the alias of the agent.

RoutingConfiguration.description: Contains details about the routing configuration of the alias.

Tags.description:
Metadata that you can assign to a resource as key-value pairs. For more information, see the following resources:

- [Tag naming limits and requirements](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/tag-editor/latest/userguide/tagging.html#tag-conventions)
- [Tagging best practices](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/tag-editor/latest/userguide/tagging.html#tag-best-practices)
